://2df142592d1dc267d9549049ee3317fa190d2f87eaa565f86ab05ec83f7ab8f5","dweb:/ipfs/QmSkJtcfWo7c42KnL5hho6GFxK6HRNV91XABx1P7xDtfLV"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5c26b39d26f7ed489e555d955dcd3e01872972e71fdd1528e93ec164e4f23385","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://efdc632af6960cf865dbc113665ea1f5b90eab75cc40ec062b2f6ae6da582017","dweb:/ipfs/QmfAZFDuG62vxmAN9DnXApv7e7PMzPqi4RkqqZHLMSQiY5"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Create2.sol":{"keccak256":"0x16926b3c19504ea52f73abe41dfa9c1ef9c328d6088b82162d475caecaa47a6d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://bc578656a08c07f33ecf4a54324bad5f951afdcd990cdab1dcde493d6bb49d9c","dweb:/ipfs/QmbXLJtTaqBg7WwC4p9gsRjA3VEwNwGc6W9afJeAaacF71"]},"temp-contracts/distribution/StakingRewardsFactory.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8ea9f8ebc3a9af75439e3c419c4f32a91e0717cb45cbea121889ecdabd2180a8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://46daf62b46f8ab1d7ad65c9a694467a545a821bcf83ddd33efb928cc00409d10","dweb:/ipfs/Qmb9zcqksj6o8UpxwbhaWYf4PwbByLZdruq7VdvmvyD6eW"]},"temp-contracts/interfaces/IStakingRewardsFactory.sol":{"keccak256":"0x243e7f229099c3463d93d341aebc65e0653ac1dbf43ae154464dd136b80eabbe","urls":["bzz-raw://fab1295d9f17f8fa70818883067548e1493bc0f9d409494a0cbfa5abecf22e42","dweb:/ipfs/QmVizgMrUEHf1Sr7tvFKfzzXumjuJRea4zzrBkvt1hfw3a"]}},"version":1}

deployStakingRewardsForPool(address,uint.details: Deploys a staking pool for the LP token of an index pool. Verifies that the staking token is the address of a pool deployed by the Indexed pool factory.

deployStakingRewardsForPoolUniswapPair(a.details: Deploys staking rewards for the LP token of the Uniswap pair between an index pool token and WETH. Verifies that the LP token is the address of a pool deployed by the Indexed pool factory, then uses the address of the Uniswap pair between it and WETH as the staking token.

increaseStakingRewards(address,uint88).details: Increases the staking rewards on the staking pool for `stakingToken` and notify the pool of the new rewards. Only allowed when the current rewards are zero and the staking pool has finished its last rewards period.

notifyRewardAmount(address).details: Notifies the staking pool for the token `stakingToken` of its pending rewards.

notifyRewardAmounts().details: Notifies all tokens of their pending rewards.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recoverERC20(address,address).details: Recovers the balance of `tokenAddress` on the staking pool for the token `stakingToken`. The token to recover must not be the staking token or the rewards token for that pool. The balance in `tokenAddress` owned by the pool will be sent to the owner of the rewards factory.

params.stakingToken: Address of the staking token whose staking pool the tokens will be recovered from.
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to recover from the staking pool.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRewardsDuration(address,uint256).details: Updates the rewards duration on the staking pool for the token `stakingToken`.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

STAKING_REWARDS_IMPLEMENTATION_ID.details: Used to identify the implementation for staking rewards proxies.

poolFactory.details: Address of the pool factory - used to verify staking token eligibility.

proxyManager.details: The address of the proxy manager - used to deploy staking pools.

rewardsToken.details: The address of the token to distribute.

stakingTokens.details: The staking tokens for which a rewards contract has been deployed.

uniswapFactory.details: The address of the Uniswap factory - used to compute the addresses of Uniswap pairs eligible for distribution.

weth.details: The address of the wrapped ether token - used to identify Uniswap pairs eligible for distribution.
